question:
You went to a museum with your elderly friend last week. However, he/she found it difficult to walk around the museum. Write a letter to the manager and say:
* Whom did  you visit the museum with?
* What problems/inconveniences did he/she face?
* also, suggest solutions to enhance the museum visit experience for an elderly person.
text: I am writing this letter to you to express my annoyance with one of the facilities provided in the museum.

I, a resident of this city, visit this place with my elderly friend who came from another city especially to view the museum. However, she could not enjoy it properly because it is hard for old people to climb stairs.

We faced too much inconvenience over there. Firstly, lifts are not in working condition due to which there is no other alternative than to use stairs. In addition to it, there is no place to sit and relax inside the whole building.

Therefore, It would be really appreciable if you could arrange some sitting places for the elderly places so that they can rest for some time. Also, there is a need to ensure that all the lifts are in working condition.
I hope you will look into this matter and serve the community in a better way.
